title: One-Owner 2005 Morgan Roadster
description: This 2005 Morgan Roadster is reportedly #82 of 82 examples produced for the US market. It was purchased new by the current owner from Morgan West of Santa Monica, California, in December 2005, and now has 4,800 miles. The car is finished in metallic green over tan leather upholstery, and power comes from a Ford 3.0-liter DOHC V6 linked to a five-speed manual transmission. Equipment includes front disc brakes, 16" wire wheels with knock-off hubs, a leather hood strap, a green soft top, and a rear-mounted spare tire. Inside, the left-hand-drive cockpit features driver and passenger airbags, air conditioning, an Alpine stereo, and green carpets. This Morgan is now offered by the seller on behalf of the owner with the original sales contract, a tonneau cover, a top boot, side curtains, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title in the owner's name.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a One-Owner 2005 Morgan Roadster at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #192,827.
